short_summary: DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND AGRI-FOOD CANADA HAS A REQUIREMENT FOR THE SUPPLY AND DELIVERY OF FLOW CYTOMETERS IN WINNIPEG, MANITOBA
description: THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND AGRI-FOOD CANADA HAS A REQUIREMENT FOR THE SUPPLY AND DELIVERY OF FLOW CYTOMETERS IN WINNIPEG, MANITOBA. THE REQUIRED SPECIFICATIONS ARE DETAILED IN ANNEX F. THE REQUIREMENT IS SUBJECT TO THE PROVISIONS OF THE CANADIAN FREE TRADE AGREEMENT (CFTA).
full_summary:
=====================================================

### 01896-230650 - Flow Cytometer Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference:** WS3814387067-Doc3921408875
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3814387067
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-21
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-20T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-03-31
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Tender Description

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is soliciting proposals for the supply and delivery of Flow Cytometers to the Department. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). All deliverables should be received by April 28, 2023.

#### Mandatory Specifications

A complete list of the mandatory specifications is detailed in Annex F.

#### Contacts

* **Contact Name:** Jordan, Amanda (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Details

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Manitoba
* **Regions of Delivery:** Manitoba
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 20, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15763810?extsite=MTU3NjM4MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15763810?extsite=MTU3Nj
